'''1.8.1'''<ref>{{tweet|dinnerbone|519526205746184193|We are planning on releasing a 1.8.1 soon.|October 7, 2014}}</ref> is a minor update for {{JE}} released on November 24, 2014 to improve performance and fix bugs.<ref>{{tweet|Dinnerbone|535025960245293056|Minecraft PC news: We're going to do another pre-release today, and hopefully do the final release of 1.8.1 on Monday if there's no issues.|November 19, 2014}}</ref> 1.8.1 is compatible with [[Java Edition 1.8|1.8]] servers.<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2014/10/minecraft-1-8-1-pre-release-1/|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2014/10/minecraft-1-8-1-pre-release-1/|title=Minecraft 1.8.1 Pre-release 2|author=Dinnerbone|website=Mojang.com|date=October 15, 2014}}</ref> This is the final version released in 2014.

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Map]]s'''
* Added proper color display support for the new blocks.

=== Command format ===
'''[[Commands/gamerule|Game rules]]'''
* <code>doEntityDrops</code> - Works like <code>doTileDrops</code> and <code>doMobDrops</code> but applies to non-mob entities (minecarts, paintings, etc.) instead.<ref name=bugfixcomment>https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-6594?focusedCommentId=202107&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-202107</ref>

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Credits]]'''
* [[Ryan Holtz]] (TheMogMiner) and [[Michael Stoyke]] (Searge) are now mentioned in the credits.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Jack o'lantern]]s'''
* Can be used to create [[iron golem]]s and [[snow golem]]s again.
* Also able to be put on head to avoid endermen, and some other mobs.

=== Items ===
'''General'''
* Now rotate on fast graphics.

'''[[Potion of Leaping]]'''
* Can now be extended with redstone.

=== Mobs ===
'''General'''
* No longer run from creepers that are about to explode.

'''[[Armor stand]]s'''
* Added <code>Marker</code> tag.

=== World generation ===
'''[[Witch hut]]s'''
* Newly generated witch huts can spawn witches on Y 64 to 71.
* This allows for three spawning floors in witch farms.

=== Command format ===
'''[[Commands/gamerule|Game rules]]'''
* <code>doTileDrops</code> no longer affects entities.

=== General ===
'''[[Options]]'''
* Renamed "Multiplayer Settings" to "Chat Settings".
* Off/fancy/fast clouds.
* Off/on entity shadows.
* Fast/fancy now only controls leaves and rain particles.

'''[[Server]]s'''
* Removed the client side [[Wikipedia:Transmission Control Protocol|TCP]] packet delay caused by [[Wikipedia:Nagle's algorithm|Nagle's algorithm]].

'''Performance'''
* Various improvements.
* Many optimizations.
